game.name: Truckin It
game.shortDescription: Truckin’ It is a fast-paced online co-op delivery game where two players struggle to deliver cargo quickly without losing it. Choose risky shortcuts or safer long routes, trust your partner, and enjoy the chaotic, silly world as you work together for the best score.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Truckin’ It is a fast-paced online co-op delivery game where two players struggle to deliver cargo quickly without losing it. Choose risky shortcuts or safer long routes, trust your partner, and enjoy the chaotic, silly world as you work together for the best score.
